description: The CS:GO Masters Championship is one of the most prestigious tournaments in the esports calendar. Top teams from around the world will compete for the coveted title and a massive prize pool of $250,000. Expect intense matches, breathtaking plays, and fierce rivalries as teams battle it out in the ultimate test of skill and strategy.

The Worlds Qualifiers is the gateway to the pinnacle of League of Legends competition. Teams from various regions will clash for a chance to secure their spot in the prestigious Worlds tournament. With a staggering prize pool of $500,000 up for grabs, every match is a high-stakes showdown where only the strongest will prevail.

The International Invitational is the crown jewel of Dota 2 esports. Featuring the best teams from around the globe, this tournament offers an unprecedented prize pool of $1,000,000. Brace yourself for epic clashes, mind-blowing plays, and unforgettable moments as teams battle for supremacy in the world of Dota 2.
